Text: Awful torrent. Once installed, the program instantly becomes unresponsive and it's unable to be uninstalled. Do not download.

same torrent - the same issues and problem

http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7745140/The.Sims.3.Deluxe.6.0.Rus.Eng.RePack_[R.G.Catalyst]
Disregard my comment about being unable to uninstall. To uninstall, go to Program Files (or Program Files x86), then R.G. Catalyst, then uninstall.

please help me.. i downloaded the game and now it's work, but the PETS expansion doesn't. I have choosen the options menu, Population Control Settings and i saw that the Pets and Horses boxes isn't ticked (the expansion pack required for this feature isn't installed). is anyone who have the same problem?!
Is it possible to install expansion packs in the future?
